Package nl.inl.blacklab.exceptions

  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    BlackLabException
    A RuntimeException generated by BlackLab.
    BlackLabRuntimeException
    A RuntimeException generated by BlackLab.
    DocumentFormatNotFound
    An unknown document format was specified, or there was some other problem with the document format.
    ErrorOpeningIndex  
    IndexTooOld  
    InsufficientMemoryAvailable
    Not enough memory available to perform the requested operation.
    InterruptedSearch
    Thrown in response to InterruptedException to indicate that a thread was interrupted.
    InvalidConfiguration
    Thrown when a configuration file is invalid.
    InvalidInputFormatConfig
    Thrown when there's an error in the input format configuration.
    InvalidQuery
    There was something wrong with the query.
    LogException
    Error logging data.
    MalformedInputFile
    Thrown when the file you're indexing is malformed in some way (i.e.
    MaxDocsReached
    Thrown when the maximum number of documents has been reached
    PluginException  
    RegexpTooLarge  
    ResultNotFound  
    WildcardTermTooBroad
